name: Hugh Hefner's After Dark: Speaking Out in America

Official sites: Hugh Hefner's After Dark: Speaking Out in America - http://povmagazine.com/articles/view/review-hugh-hefners-after-dark-speaking-out-in-america
HUGH HEFNER'S AFTER DARK: SPEAKING OUT IN AMERICA (2018) - https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/hugh_hefners_after_dark_speaking_out_in_america/

description: HUGH HEFNER'S AFTER DARK: SPEAKING OUT IN AMERICA features a treasure trove of archival footage from Hugh Hefner's landmark TV series, Playboy's Penthouse (1 season, 1959-1960) and Playboy After Dark (2 seasons, 1968-1970).
